metadata.name: Chrysanthemum #1
metadata.description:
Visit [Chrysanthemum.app/1](https://chrysanthemum.app/1) to experience in fullsceen, and activate Chrysanthemum as an immersive biofeedback experience. By connecting a bluetooth heart rate monitor, Chrysanthemum comes to life â€” the audio and visual patterns respond to your heartbeat in real-time. A new approach to binaural beats dynamically changes the beat frequency in response to your heart.

Click to play/pause the music.

Best experienced on modern hardware.
